title: Lenovo Smart Tab M10 FHD Plus (2nd Gen) with Google Assistant 4 GB RAM 128 GB ROM 10.3 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Iron Grey)

product_specification.Model Name: Smart Tab M10 FHD Plus (2nd Gen) with Google Assistant
product_specification.Processor Type: MediaTek Helio P22T Octa Core (4 x A53 at 2.3 GHz, 4 x A53 at 1.8 GHz)
product_specification.Operating Frequency: Bands Supported: GSM - B2/B3/B5/B8, WCDMA - B1/B2/B3/B5 (B6/B19)/B8, FDD LTE - B1/B2/B3/B4/B5 (B19)/B7/B8/B20, TDD LTE - B38/B40
product_specification.Additional Features: Upto 93% Full Metal Back Cover, Upto 87% Panel-to-body Ratio, Bumpy Environment Alert, Posture Alert, Dual Side Speakers Tuned by Dolby Atmos, Google Assistant Ambient Mode (Ask to Listen to Music, Ask to Control Your Home), Face Unlock, Dual Microphones (with Dedicated DSP), FM Radio, Eye Protection, Included Applications: Kid’s Mode, Tips, Netflix, Google, Gmail, Google Chrome, Google Photos, Google Play Store
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Adapter (5V/2A), USB Type C Cable, Smart Charging Station, 1.2 m USB Charging Cable for Smart Charging Station, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card and Safety Guide
product_specification.Other Camera Features: Auto Focus Rear Camera, Fixed Focus Front Camera
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Bluetooth Support, 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz Dual Band Wireless Connectivity, WiFi Direct
product_specification.Other Display Features: Full HD+ LED Backlit Multi Touch IPS Display (330 nits Brightness, 70.3% NTSC Color Gamut, TDDI Direct Bonding Screen)
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Stylish Design: Featuring a sleek and aesthetically appealing design, the Lenovo Smart Tab M10 Tablet is here to make heads turn for all the right reasons. It has a thickness of 8.1 mm and comes with narrow bezels to offer a wider screen area so you can enjoy a stunning visual experience.
product_description.Stunning Display: This tablet comes with a 26.16 cm (10.3) FHD display and TDDI technology for a stunning visual experience. The dual speakers of this tablet, with Dolby Atmos, deliver a 3D surround sound effect so that you can enjoy an immersive aural experience.
product_description.Reduced Blue Light Emissions: Thanks to the reduced emissions of the harmful blue light rays, you can play games, watch movies, browse the Web, and more for long hours without straining your eyes.
product_description.Kids Mode 4.0: Thanks to the Kids Mode 4.0, you can monitor the content that’s viewed by your kids and you can even limit their browsing time. It also comes with features, such as posture alert, parental control, bumpy environment alert, and more.
product_description.Google Assistant Ambient Mode: To activate the Google Assistant Ambient Mode, you need to dock this tablet in its Smart Charging Station. Once docked, you can access various Google services with voice commands. The dual microphones in this tablet can pick up your voice commands even when you’re standing at a distance.
product_description.Smart Features: When the Google Assistant Ambient Mode is activated, you can use voice commands to play your favorite songs from various music streaming platforms, such as Gaana, Spotify, Saavn, and more, or play trending videos on YouTube. Furthermore, you can also convert this tablet into a digital photo frame so that you can display all your favorite and cherishable photos that are saved on Google Photos in a slideshow format.
product_description.G-Suite: With this tablet, you can access G-Suite and use it according to your convenience. With Google Assitant, you can get your queries answered using your voice. With Google Duo, you can video chat with friends and family. With Google Maps, you can get directions to your friend's place or a mall with ease. By saying ‘Ok Google’, you can control the various smart home devices with your voice.
product_description.Powerful Processor: This tablet is powered by a 2.3 GHz octa-core processor and 4 GB of RAM so you can enjoy a powerful and lag-free computing experience.
product_description.Operating System: This tablet runs on the Android Pie OS, offering a smooth user experience. It also offers amazing features, such as the dark mode, adaptive brightness, app timer, and more. You can store lots of photos, videos, and movies on this tablet, thanks to its 128 GB internal storage. This laptop also supports the 4G LTE network so you can connect with your loved ones with ease.

review:
Extremely happy about the product! Prompt delivery by flipkart.

UPDATE: Charging time 19% to 90% took 2hrs for 5100 mah backup which is not good also not bad. Its upto users perspective. But battery management is awesome.
Screen resolution is slightly lesser (1920x 1200px) than FULLHD so you can see black bars in top and bottom when watching any streaming videos online.

Pros:
Battery, speakers, screen while watching videos and movies.
WiFi connectivity is awesome. No lag.
4Gb RAM and 128gb storage for this price (comparison with overpriced Samsung tablet)
No heating issue even while charging in Dock and videos are running (not recommended though)

2 charging options - Dock with micro USB and Type C charge port in tablet for direct charging is an added advantage both are charging at good speed.

Google Home support is awesome.

Cons:
Lenovo should improve the software. Though it gives pure android experience, icons are not crisp but while watching video screen it is amazingly clear. So it's a software improvement which lenovo should do. It's 2020 May month manufactured but still android 9. Fingers crossed for next upgrade.

Overall worth value for the money paid. JUST GO FOR IT!!!!

After using it for two weeks, I think I qualify for writing this review. I will writrle in easy 3 parts - good, bad and ugly, as per today's standard user expectancy. I won't write much a about performance as its widely understandable that no one buys this to play Pubg, mostly this is for schooling and for that, this tab has more than enough for "everything".

Good.
Biggest part, it was available in stock, since "schooling from home" is new normal, there was no "good" tablet available. This item was ready to ship on the same day and I got it on 3rd day after I planed an order.
128 GB internal storage at this price point is excellent.
Docking station. This is big for student to study (really helpful)
Google assist
Looks good

Bad.
Camera quality is not that good.
No case or screen guard available in market as of now. (I wish at least screen guard was available as this would be used by kids)

Ugly
Charger (very slow) - u expect to have a fast charger. And it's really irritating.
Small battery (I wish they had given 6500+ battery) that drain quickly.

Verdict :
Apart from certain flows, this is a good tablet, but...
If you can, I would recommend u to go for Samsung S6 lite, it would be 7k more for you to spend with less storage (but practically you don't need all the storage all the time) it has..
Also Samsung has 7000 Mah battery,
+ Samsung pen included (which is amazing - ur kid would love it)
And it has Samsung build quality.

I couldn't buy that cause it wasn't available than and I couldn't wait because of my son's schooling.

Good performance, fast charging, a good and long duration of screen-on-time (sufficient for reading and to attend/ deliver talk), an average camera, and the best price in this segment. I would like to give 4.8 stars.

😇review after 1 week of purchase 😇
😁This is Soo good at this price range this is the best tab you could get with so great storage...
😁If you're buying for online classes and study purpose it does the job perfectly..
😁Also you can go for some sketches and note taking..
🥴Camera quality not that great but it's okay..it does the job...
😁Audio quality is good ...
😁it also comes with screenshot ,screen recording, eye protection, notification free mode which I personally liked...
😁also you can get the cover and glass at local market so it's not an issue...
😁conclusion : best tab at this price 😂

Performance wise good. Storage capacity at this price segment no other option.
1000 for smart changing station little bit costly but good.
You can go for it's 19990 variant same only no smart charging station.
Backup almost 2 day.
5000 battery full capacity.
Voice calling facility available.
I got it for 20990 that's fair price.
I am using for office and study purpose as well while travelling and outstation. It fullfill your laptop need while you are outstation.
I recommend for it if someone need it.
Go for it.

Everything is good except battery backup, sound and voice call connectivity.
Battery backup - Must be fully charged to attend all school classes. 4-5 classes.
Speaker- Sound is easily audible in normal home environment but seems a bit low if others are talking nearby. Also sound lacks loudness.
Call connectivity- It supports voice call over VOLTE I think. But many times calls connects but sound is not audible of the person talking through this device.

Writing this review after 10 days of usage.
Pros:
- Solid full metal body
- 10.3' Narrow bezel FHD display, crisp and clear
- Smart dock charger (MicroUSB) + Type-C charger in Tab
- 4GB RAM + 128 GB storage in this price range
- Supports voice call. And 4G video calls through JioCall app
- Decent camera for video calls
- Loud and clear stereo sound with Dolby Atmos
- Battery lasts 5-6 hours of moderate use
- No heating issues whatsoever
- No lag or connectivity problems
- Google Assistant and Kids Mode

Cons:
- No HD support for OTT apps like Prime, Hotstar, Netflix. But YouTube looks awesome in 1080p though. So it's not the hardware issue (Lenovo may be able to resolve this with an updated WideVine certification in the next OTA version - Hopefully)
- No fast charging, takes 4 hours minimum to charge it full and 1 hour of video call drains almost 25% of battery
- Accessories like Case or Screen guards are not available as of today as this tab is very new to the global market.

Verdict: Value for money tab - Great specs and very solid build. If it gets HD support enabled for OTT platforms, it will be a game changer for entertainment usage in this price range.

The tablet is a decent configuration and works fine. My son has been using it for his zoom classes, and for online games and it is working well. No lag or hazy images.
The calling function is cumbersome due to the size.
Battery life is OK, he has to charge it twice a day due to heavy usage. (4hrs of online classes+2 Hr of gaming +1 Hr of fitness class)
I am. Happy as the other options available now have half the RAM and a quarter of the storage space for about the same price.
I will recommend it for others as well.
Bought for my child to attain online classes , finding it very easy and comfortable with smart stand cum charger . nice product worth buying 👌

Everything is fine except battery, which I wish, should have been around 7000mah.It is excellent for reading and viewing films and videos.Google Assistant is responsive. For Rs.21000 it is value for money.Lenovo was quick to upgrade Android to 10 immediately after activation of the tab. Satisfied till now; The real performance would be known after using it for atleast three months.

Cons-

4.there is a problem in mic, when Google assistant is turned on then mic doesn't works in calls either u restart your tab before calling or disable Google assistant.
5.my tab has frozen issue 3 times guess what I was doing just reading Google feeds.
Conclusion-
You can definately buy this tab if your requirements are watching movies and for studying online but don't think that you can play heavy games on it.its worthy buying it as entertainment tablet.

Very good tablet. I am using this tablet for online classes. With the help of universal stylus pen for android and handwrite app, it has become very convenient to take these classes.

Pros.
1. High storage 128gb
2. Very good touch feedback, no lag (4gb ram)
3. Viewing angles are very good. The charging dock further allows you to have video conferencing in a hands-free way.
4. Bluetooth, wifi, 4g sim connectivity including voice calls via 4g sim are very good.
5. Multiple user login accounts and kids mode are good options if you want to use it as a family entertainment device.
6. Sound and battery backup are very good. With normal usage including browsing and video conferencing of about 4-5hours, I am getting a battery backup of more than 24hours.

Cons.
1. Charger is not fast charger.

I have been using it for a week now and I feel:
The tab is an excellent choice for learners and students who need a portable workspace for their daily classes. The battery back up works a good 5-6 hours on low to dim backlight. The higher the screen lighting the less battery back up. My advice: once done with a class and you have a break dim the light to preserve the battery.
One con of this device that really affected me is the lack of a stylus which makes me a little handicapped as I am a teacher and a stylus compatible to this device could help me correct the way we would correct notebooks at school.

All in all, a good choice for someone who can't shell out 32-33 grand for a tab like Samsung.
